version_description:
Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Goofing mode
- Haptic BPM
- New color schemes

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Goofing mode
- Haptic BPM
- New color schemes

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Now you can change the sound of chord from the piano to synth.
- Easy mode (simplification for easy reading).

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Now you can change the sound of chord from the piano to synth.
- Easy mode (simplification for easy reading).

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- One more chords sound
- Fixed some bugs

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- One more chords sound
- Fixed some bugs

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Now, when you tap on the pattern of the first chord, a full scale is displayed.
- The second synthesizer has been replaced.
- Now, when you first start the app, "Easy mode" is turned on by default for e

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Now, when you tap on the pattern of the first chord, a full scale is displayed.
- The second synthesizer has been replaced.
- Now, when you first start the app, "Easy mode" is turned on by default for e

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Added tool "Scale/Progression (Schemes)"
- Added tool "Tuner"

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Added tool "Scale/Progression (Schemes)"
- Added tool "Tuner"

Thanks for using our app! In this update:
- Fixed bug with the "Tuner" tool.
- Added many new moods of progressions.
